Deactivates the slideshow and removes the layout from the parent panel.

A very simple "printf"-type debugger.

The default horizontal padding between the thumbnail images of the gallery

The default vertical padding between the thumbnail images of the gallery
DEFAULT_HTML - Static variable in class de.eckhartarnold.client.HTMLLayout
An example HTML chunk that puts the control panel at the top, the image panel in the middle and the caption at the bottom.

The default height of the thumnail images of the gallery

delay - Variable in class de.eckhartarnold.client.ControlPanelOverlay
The time in milliseconds until the control panel popup is hidden again after showing

the dialog box that the debugger pops up
disallowAutoResize() - Method in class de.eckhartarnold.client.ControlPanel
Disallows automatic adjustment of the size of the control panel if the size of the image panel changes.
